changelogversion.changelogtext: Remove broken built-in sources (hitomi.la, 8muses), please use extensions instead
fix crashes in many extensions (danbooru, pixiv, some chinese exts, etc)
support new image formats (AVIF, HEIF/HEIC, JXL)
fix corrupt reader filter test image (thanks kenry)
fix automatic backup not deleting old files
fix extension preferences not applying correctly in multi-lang or multi-source exts
fix shizuku installing extensions to the wrong user on multi-user devices (thanks redjard)
improved keyboard/dpad navigation in chapter select (for my flip phone)
use .tachibk extension for backups instead of .proto.gz
fix missing "last used source" display in sources screen
remove default tachiyomi extension repo (its extensions are only for self-hosting anyway)
add intent for adding ext repos (repos can now be added with a single click on a website)
add error handling to repos (no longer fails to load all repos if only one errors)
change ExH icon to a sad panda (it was always supposed to be this way but i forgot)
fix cloudflare opening blob:urls in webview
updated EH/EXH to their new pagination systems
add ability to change user agent in advanced settings
fix some small issues with the light theme
fix searching of tags containing spaces when tapping chips
update default UA for nH (now bypasses cloudflare)
Fix the library search issue with tags containing "-" (searching "x-ray" no longer searches for "x -ray")
Fix tracking not working when reading chapters
Add support for 1.3 extlib (this means extensions will work again)
Literally 1984, removed library refresh times below 12 hours. The Tachiyomi people required this.
tracker updates now queue up when offline and update on reconnect
added new extension installation system. There's an "update all" button now
fixed swipe gestures in the reader (Thanks KraXen72)
fixed a bunch of random extension issues
Fixed library update stopping halfway when an error is thrown fetching chapters
Added "Download all unread" and similar options when long pressing manga in library
Added smoothie theme (you really dont want to use it though, it's pink and yellow)
Whoops, this is a hotfix patch
Fixed crash when creating saved searches
Made continue reading button visibility setting take effect immediately
Made compact grid manga titles white on light theme
Some new reader modes were added, pl0x dont use them theyre not done and suck rn
MyAnimeList's login system has changed, please re-login.
This update is just bugfixes and minor features
added new, faster, offline backup system
added ability to download all unread directly from catalogue
added continue reading button. Setting available in filter settings
This entire update is just minor bugfixes
Fix batch add for delegated sources
Fix the hamburger back button animation
Now nearly up to date with tachiyomi Dev, thanks syer
Such a good update it had to skip a version number
Delegated tsumino - Make sure to install the tsumino extension
App lock no longer requires usage access and should work better
Added drag and drop filtering, thanks jay
Lock no longer requires usage permission
upgraded to androidx, this wont do anything for you but it was hard to do
tag searching now works on non-hentai manga
loading speed improvements when skipping through manga
